page.title: 12A receptionist, Bowness.
page.content:
A large hotel might have several {receptionists}working at different times during the day.
Among the varied tasks they have to perform are the following:
Answering the{letters, booking rooms, {confirming reservations}and{tariffs and{taking deposits,}answering the {telephone,}giving out{keys,}booking {doctors}appointments and{hairdressers appointments, doing the{accounts, typing{menus}for{lunch,dinner}and {breakfast,}handing out{brochures}and helping people to decide where to go and what route to take to the many places of{interest}in the area.
